    Blase Data Object

    BlaseData-class.Rd

    For creation details, see as.BlaseData()

    Value

    An BlaseData object

    Slots

    pseudobulk_bins

    list of data.frames. Each item is a normalised count matrix representing a bin, where a column is a cell in the bin and each row is a gene.

    bins

    list. A list of bin names for each timepoint.

    genes

    list. A list of the genes selected for discriminating timepoints.

    Examples

    counts <- matrix(rpois(100, lambda = 10), ncol=10, nrow=10)
sce <- SingleCellExperiment::SingleCellExperiment(assays = list(normcounts = counts))
sce$pseudotime = seq_len(10)
as.BlaseData(sce, pseudotime_slot="pseudotime", n_bins=3)
#> Blase Data with:
#> 	bins: c(1, 2, 3)
#> 	selected genes: character(0)
